getAllShapes

addShape

public void addShape(java.awt.Shape s)
Converts all added shapes to Area instances if they are not already, since Sun's 2D API was badly designed and prevents you from applying AffineTransforms to most shapes.

Without the auto-conversion, it is hard to write decent GUIs because you are not allowed to use the AffineTransform class, so you cannot do rotations etc without implementing it all by hand, and creating large switch statements to deal with all possible shapes (which all have different API's)

Parameters:
s -

getShapesAtPoint

public java.util.ArrayList getShapesAtPoint(int[] point)
